attributes.action: Gordon Brown must offer Ama Sumani return to UK with free medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The inhumane deportation of terminally ill Ama Sumani to Ghana and the abandonment of her in a hotel she can't afford and a city she has no knowledge of without any medical treatment available to her by this government is out of step with the kindness and generosity of us the citizens of the UK. We demand she be offered return to UK and full treatment.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
